Package io.opentelemetry.context.propagation

Interface HttpTextFormat.Setter<C>

  • Type Parameters:
    C - carrier of propagation fields, such as an http request
    Enclosing interface:
    HttpTextFormat<V>
    public static interface HttpTextFormat.Setter<C>
    Class that allows a HttpTextFormat to set propagated fields into a carrier.

    Setter is stateless and allows to be saved as a constant to avoid runtime allocations.

    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void put​(C carrier, String key, String value)
      Replaces a propagated field with the given value.

    • Method Detail

      • put

        void put​(C carrier,
         String key,
         String value)
        Replaces a propagated field with the given value.

        For example, a setter for an HttpURLConnection would be the method reference URLConnection.addRequestProperty(String, String)

        Parameters:
        carrier - holds propagation fields. For example, an outgoing message or http request.
        key - the key of the field.
        value - the value of the field.
        Since:
        0.1.0
